categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Gold Leader" was the callsign of a clone trooper pilot who served as commander of the Y-wing unit Gold Squadron during the Battle of Anaxes.

In the original unfinished version of "Unfinished Business", released in 2015, Gold Leader wears the same clone pilot uniform and face-revealing flight helmet as the clone pilots seen in Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. However, in the final version of the episode released on Disney+ in 2020, he wears the standard Phase II pilot armor.
